========================================================
        COMPLIANCE REPORT - CIS 5.3.3.4.4
========================================================
Reference: CIS RHEL 8 Benchmark v4.0.0 checkpoint 5.3.3.4.4
========================================================

REQUIREMENT 1 - Verify that the pam_unix.so module lines in the password stack in /etc/pam.d/password-auth and /etc/pam.d/system-auth include the 'use_authtok' argument:
  Task: Check use_authtok in PAM files
  Command: grep -P -- '^\h*password\h+([^#\n\r]+)\h+pam_unix\.so\h+([^#\n\r]+\h+)?use_authtok\b' /etc/pam.d/{password,system}-auth

  Exit code: 0
  Data: /etc/pam.d/password-auth:password    sufficient    pam_unix.so try_first_pass use_authtok nullok sha512 shadow
/etc/pam.d/system-auth:password   sufficient pam_unix.so sha512 shadow nullok try_first_pass use_authtok remember=5
  Status: PASS
